sources.title: Bargain Counter Attack (1946)
sources.description: Lulu goes to a department store to exchange her doll for something else. While looking for a new item Lulu manages to terrorize the section manager, ski down the escalators, and cause a noahic flood in the store. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bargain-counter-attack-1946/

metadata.Plot: Lulu goes to a department store to exchange her doll for something else. While looking for a new item Lulu manages to terrorize the section manager, ski down the escalators, and cause a Noahic flood in the store.
metadata.Actors: Mae Questel, Jackson Beck, Cecil Roy
